summary: A series of killings occur, with no suspects, the locals soon decide that Bigfoot is responsible.
cast: Janus Raudkivi|Randolph Rebane|Stafford Morgan|Katie Hopkins Zerby|Richard Kennedy|Otis Young|John F. Goff|George 'Buck' Flower|John Eimerman|Randolph Scott|Wally Flaherty|Durwood McDonald|William Dexter|Harry Youstos|Verkina Flower|Greg Gault|Nelson C. Sheppo|Mitzi Kress|Woody Jarvis|Douglas Ibold|William D. Cannon|Patty Holzmann|Mitch Irish|Jeana Keough|Denise Cheshire
title: La leyenda del Yeti
